page_content: The page provides guidelines for the tax year 2017, covering various topics such as natural persons, self-employment, and agriculture.
The page discusses the 5th stage of the Tour de Suisse 2010, providing information on traffic disruptions and safety guidelines.
The page provides information on how to claim foreign withholding tax credits and refunds in the context of U.S. assets.
The page provides recommendations for attendees of a football match at Stade de Suisse, focusing on transportation and parking.
The page provides guidelines on how to declare various types of securities and investments in tax returns.
The page provides guidelines on how to declare assets and securities, both domestic and foreign, in tax returns.
